artist: Painter: After Michiel van Musscher; Etcher: Charles G. Lewis
description: painter, seated at an easel wearing all black with flat white collar; holding palette and brushed in left hand and palette knife in right hand; in an interior with paintings on the walls and on the floor
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription
below image in black: M. Van Musscher pinx.   Cha\'s G. Lewis sculp\'t / wILLIAM VANDER VELDE, JUNIOR / From a Picture in the Collection of / His Excellency the Baron Verstolk and Loelen, Hague  | on sheet in pencil
title: William Vander Velde, Junior
